summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3080, for the improvement of 50th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Hudson Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37371 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
